channel.title: Becoming King, a Strategy Guide
channel.description:
Hello
Today I'm going to give strategy for which classes to become king as:
Firstly, classes you should UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES trade for being King: For Blue Dragon: Knight, Paladin, Physician, Prince, Sheriff For Black Rose: Mastermind For Cult: None For Neutral: Alchemist
Next, classes that you should ONLY trade for King IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES(and even then you should CONSIDER NOT DOING IT): For Blue Dragon: Priest(If Revive used), Psychic(If both uses of Visions used) For Black Rose: Assassin(If Mastermind is still alive) For Cult: Cult Leader(If at least 1 cultist alive) For Neutral: Possessor(If caught or under serious pressure), Reaper(If caught or under serious pressure)
Now, classes which are OKAY to trade for King but you should CONSIDER YOUR OPTIONS: For Blue Dragon: Butler, Court Wizard, Observer, Princess For Black Rose: Enforcer, Illusionist, Nightwatch, Sage, Sellsword, Servant, Soulcatcher For Cult: Apostle, Invoker For Neutral: Mercenary, Fool
and Finally, classes which you should ABSOLUTELY trade for King, given the chance: For Blue Dragon: Noble For Black Rose: Herbalist, Traitor Noble, Traitor Princess For Cult: Ritualist, Seeker For Neutral: None
Hope this helps, if it doesn't then that's okay I guess

item.title: Becoming King, a Strategy Guide
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Hello

Today I’m going to give strategy for which classes to become king as:

Firstly, classes you should UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES trade for being King:
For Blue Dragon: Knight, Paladin, Physician, Prince, Sheriff
For Black Rose: Mastermind
For Cult: None
For Neutral: Alchemist

Next, classes that you should ONLY trade for King IN CERTAIN CIRCUMSTANCES(and even then you should CONSIDER NOT DOING IT):
For Blue Dragon: Priest(If Revive used), Psychic(If both uses of Visions used)
For Black Rose: Assassin(If Mastermind is still alive)
For Cult: Cult Leader(If at least 1 cultist alive)
For Neutral: Possessor(If caught or under serious pressure), Reaper(If caught or under serious pressure)

Now, classes which are OKAY to trade for King but you should CONSIDER YOUR OPTIONS:
For Blue Dragon: Butler, Court Wizard, Observer, Princess
For Black Rose: Enforcer, Illusionist, Nightwatch, Sage, Sellsword, Servant, Soulcatcher
For Cult: Apostle, Invoker
For Neutral: Mercenary, Fool

and Finally, classes which you should ABSOLUTELY trade for King, given the chance:
For Blue Dragon: Noble
For Black Rose: Herbalist, Traitor Noble, Traitor Princess
For Cult: Ritualist, Seeker
For Neutral: None

Hope this helps, if it doesn’t then that’s okay I guess

Read full topic
